name: wikisort
description: WikiSort is generally as fast as a standard merge sort while using O(1) memory, and is even faster when the input is partially ordered or as the arrays get larger

scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: nyc npm run test-node && nyc report
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm run test-node && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: Nir Leibovitch <nir@rightapp.io>
